metadata.title: CVE-2024-26965 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:clk: qcom: mmcc-msm8974: fix terminating of frequency table arraysThe frequency table arrays are supposed to be terminated with anempty element. Add such entry to the end of the arrays where itis missing in order to avoid possible out-of-bound access whenthe table is traversed by functions like qcom_find_freq() orqcom_find_freq_floor().Only compile tested.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
